scripts.start: node scripts/sync-pandasuite-json.js auth && cross-env VITE_APP_TARGET=auth vite
scripts.start:session: node scripts/sync-pandasuite-json.js session && cross-env VITE_APP_TARGET=session vite
scripts.build:auth: node scripts/sync-pandasuite-json.js auth && cross-env VITE_APP_TARGET=auth vite build --outDir build-auth --emptyOutDir && node scripts/sync-pandasuite-json.js clear
scripts.build:session: node scripts/sync-pandasuite-json.js session && cross-env VITE_APP_TARGET=session vite build --outDir build-session --emptyOutDir && node scripts/sync-pandasuite-json.js clear
scripts.package:auth: cp src/json/auth/pandasuite.json build-auth/pandasuite.json && cd build-auth && zip -r -X ../pandasuite-auth-component.zip *
scripts.package:session: cp src/json/session/pandasuite.json build-session/pandasuite.json && cd build-session && zip -r -X ../pandasuite-session-component.zip *
scripts.build-all: yarn clean && yarn build:auth && yarn package:auth && yarn build:session && yarn package:session && node scripts/sync-pandasuite-json.js clear
scripts.clean: rm -rf build build-auth build-session && rm -f pandasuite-auth-component.zip pandasuite-session-component.zip public/pandasuite.json
